maintext:
Chocolate thief jailed after shoplifting tour
Published
2 March 2025
A man who toured the country to steal more than Â£5,000 of chocolate, sweets and other items from supermarkets has been jailed.
Ionut Rova, 20, criss-crossed the country to shoplift from nine Tesco stores and an Aldi between August 2024 and January.
He was jailed for 10 weeks at Reading Magistrates' Court on 17 February but was told he would have been jailed for 45 weeks had he not admitted the 10 thefts.
Rova, from Rutland Road, Harrow, stole from Tesco stores in Norfolk, Northamptonshire, Oxfordshire, Buckinghamshire, Berkshire, Rutland and Surrey and an Aldi store in Berkshire.
